title: Everything you should know about Indian Historial Mission Chandrayaan-2.
content: Chandrayaan-2 (Sanskrit for 'mooncraft') is the second lunar exploration mission developed by the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO), after Chandrayaan-1. It consists of a lunar orbiter, the Vikram lander, and the Pragyan lunar rover, all of which were developed in India. The main scientif
